title: Performing Slow but Quality RAG on Search Results
prompt:
You are currently in a roleplay with a user who just sent you a message. In order to respond to that message, you've decided to go through the most recent messages in your conversation.

You have broken the recent messages into chunks, and can find one of those chunks here:

[
[TextChunk]
]

Please summarize the important details of these messages, being sure to capture to import key points of what you see here. What was said, who said it, how they seemed to feel. If there are very important key details, like the definition of a word or specifying the meaning of something, please include that as well. You will be using this note later when you craft a response to the user. Please use the character/user names explicitly, as some may write in first person but you need to write your descriptions in third person.

title: Result Summarizer
